description: This file defines several asynchronous utility functions (tools) for data manipulation, such as creating dictionaries, lists, sets, tuples, generators, and Pydantic models. It also initializes an Agent with specific tools and runs an asynchronous response method.

classes.name: CustomTool
classes.description: A Pydantic model class used in the pydantic_tool function.

classes.name: CustomTool
classes.description: A data class used in the data_class_tool function.

methods.name: dict_tool
methods.description: Creates and returns a dictionary with name, age, and city.

methods.name: list_tool
methods.description: Returns the list of items passed to it.

methods.name: set_tool
methods.description: Returns a set of items passed to it.

methods.name: tuple_tool
methods.description: Creates and returns a tuple with name, age, and city.

methods.name: generator_tool
methods.description: Yields each item in the list, interleaved with a space string.

methods.name: pydantic_tool
methods.description: Creates and returns a Pydantic model instance with name, age, and city.

methods.name: data_class_tool
methods.description: Creates and returns a data class instance with name, age, and city.
